00030 #ifndef TAGLIB_WVFILE_H
00031 #define TAGLIB_WVFILE_H
00032 
00033 #include "tfile.h"
00034 #include "taglib_export.h"
00035 #include "wavpackproperties.h"
00036 
00037 namespace TagLib {
00038 
00039   class Tag;
00040 
00041   namespace ID3v1 { class Tag; }
00042   namespace APE { class Tag; }
00043 
00045 
00053   namespace WavPack {
00054 
00056 
00064     class TAGLIB_EXPORT File : public TagLib::File
00065     {
00066     public:
00071       enum TagTypes {
00073         NoTags  = 0x0000,
00075         ID3v1   = 0x0001,
00077         APE     = 0x0002,
00079         AllTags = 0xffff
00080       };
00081 
00087       File(FileName file, bool readProperties = true,
00088            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00089 
00095       File(IOStream *stream, bool readProperties = true,
00096            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00097 
00101       virtual ~File();
00102 
00107       virtual TagLib::Tag *tag() const;
00108 
00114       PropertyMap properties() const;
00115 
00121       PropertyMap setProperties(const PropertyMap&);
00122 
00127       virtual Properties *audioProperties() const;
00128 
00132       virtual bool save();
00133 
00146       ID3v1::Tag *ID3v1Tag(bool create = false);
00147 
00159       APE::Tag *APETag(bool create = false);
00160 
00169       void strip(int tags = AllTags);
00170 
00171     private:
00172       File(const File &);
00173       File &operator=(const File &);
00174 
00175       void read(bool readProperties, Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle);
00176       void scan();
00177       long findID3v1();
00178       long findAPE();
00179 
00180       class FilePrivate;
00181       FilePrivate *d;
00182     };
00183   }
00184 }
00185 
00186 #endif
